13.3. Case Study 1: No Trend or Seasonality 234
 daily-total-female-births.csv 1
Save the ﬁle with the ﬁlename daily-total-female-births.csv in your current working
directory. The dataset has one year, or 365 observations. We will use the ﬁrst 200 for training
and the remaining 165 as the test set. The complete example grid searching the daily female
univariate time series forecasting problem is listed below.
# grid search sarima hyperparameters for daily female dataset
from math import sqrt
